refnamediv.refpurpose: Execute a query that does not prefetch and buffer all data

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: sqlite_unbuffered_query is identical to sqlite_query except that the result that is returned is a sequential forward-only result set that can only be used to read each row, one after the other.
This function is ideal for generating things such as HTML tables where you only need to process one row at a time and don't need to randomly access the row data.

note.para: Functions such as sqlite_seek and sqlite_rewind do not work on result handles returned from this function.
